name: MEC Padded Shoulder Strap
description: Replace or upgrade the shoulder strap on your courier or messenger bag. The padded section distributes the load to keep your ride or walk comfortable.Made of nylon webbing.Padded section is 29cm long and 7.2cm wide at the widest point.Pad slides along strap to provide cushioning in the right place.Swivel hooks on both ends.Adjusts from 45–158cm.
